transcript: you want to sell the vacation not the plane flight a lot of people when they want to sell stuff they talk about the widgets they talk about checking their bag and taking their shoes off and who they're going to sit next to on the plane and the seat and how long the flight's going to be but people just want Maui you should be describing the beach and the ocean what they're going to experience the moment they get into the hotel room that's what we should describing not how they're going to get there once you sell the vacation that's when you make the ask if they don't say yes immediately totally reasonable most people don't then we walk them through making the decision-making process
